data.title: Rowan Atkinson
data.meta_description: After several years garnering critical acclaim, Rowan found national prominence with Not the Nine ‘O’ Clock News.
data.text:
A message from Peter Bennett- Jones & the sad cancellation of this years Edinburgh Festival.

The Edinburgh Festival and its mighty sprawling Fringe is the corner-stone of many people’s year: performers, technicians , promoters, publicists, venue managers, students, punters,agents and the good burghers of this wonderful city – the world’s capital of culture, artistic endeavour and lager consumption every August since its founding in 1947 to “provide a platform for the flowering of the human spirit”
